name: Opposites Attract (Morrisvi)
description:
A game I made for the 2022 Global Game Jam.

You play as 2 characters Plus and Minus at the same time as you move through a maze while collecting energy before the timer runs out. Once you've collected all the energy, have Plus and Minus meet each other before the timer runs out.

Arrow key sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/arrow-keys-wsad-mouse-icon
Sounds: https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/
Wall sprites: https://jehal.itch.io/pixel-art-environment-tileset
